languages.text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Адальберт был предупрежден, но предпочел не бежать, а устроить нам ловушку. Неужели он надеялся, что это безумие увенчается успехом, и он уцелеет?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Адальберт был предупрежден, но предпочел не бежать, а устроить нам ловушку. Неужели он надеялся, что это безумие увенчается успехом, и он уцелеет?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet chose not to flee, but to set up a trap for us. Did he really hope this madness would succeed and he would survive?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet chose not to flee, but to set up a trap for us. Did he really hope this madness would succeed and he would survive?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"
"Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

languages.text: "Ja, Lord Captain. Adalbert war gewarnt, hat sich aber gegen eine Flucht entschieden Stattdessen blieb er zurück, um uns eine Falle zu stellen. Hat er wirklich geglaubt, dieser Wahnsinn könne erfolgreich sein und er würde irgendwie überleben?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Lord Captain. Adalbert war gewarnt, hat sich aber gegen eine Flucht entschieden Stattdessen blieb er zurück, um uns eine Falle zu stellen. Hat er wirklich geglaubt, dieser Wahnsinn könne erfolgreich sein und er würde irgendwie überleben?"

languages.text: «Sí, Lord Capitán. Adalbert había sido advertido, pero prefirió no huir. En vez de eso, se quedó para tendernos una trampa. ¿De verdad creía que esta locura triunfaría y que él sobreviviría de algún modo?».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, Lord Capitán. Adalbert había sido advertido, pero prefirió no huir. En vez de eso, se quedó para tendernos una trampa. ¿De verdad creía que esta locura triunfaría y que él sobreviviría de algún modo?».

languages.text: 「そうです、ロード・キャプテン。アダルバートは警告を受けていたにもかかわらず、逃げる選択をしなかった。それどころか、私たちに罠を仕掛けるために残ったのです。彼はこの強行が成功して、どうにか生き延びられると本当に信じていたのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうです、ロード・キャプテン。アダルバートは警告を受けていたにもかかわらず、逃げる選択をしなかった。それどころか、私たちに罠を仕掛けるために残ったのです。彼はこの強行が成功して、どうにか生き延びられると本当に信じていたのでしょうか？」

languages.text: “没错。舰长大人。阿达伯特早已得到了警告，但他并没有逃跑，而是留在这里，给我们设下了陷阱。莫非他真的以为他这种疯狂的阴谋能够得逞，以为他自己能活下来吗？”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

traits.locale_text: “没错。舰长大人。阿达伯特早已得到了警告，但他并没有逃跑，而是留在这里，给我们设下了陷阱。莫非他真的以为他这种疯狂的阴谋能够得逞，以为他自己能活下来吗？”

languages.text: « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Adalbert était au courant, mais il n'a pas cherché à s'enfuir pour autant. Au contraire, il est resté pour nous tendre une embuscade. Croyait-il vraiment que cette folle entreprise aboutirait et qu'il réussirait à sauver sa peau ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Adalbert était au courant, mais il n'a pas cherché à s'enfuir pour autant. Au contraire, il est resté pour nous tendre une embuscade. Croyait-il vraiment que cette folle entreprise aboutirait et qu'il réussirait à sauver sa peau ? »

languages.text: "Evet Lord Kaptan. Adalbert uyarılmıştı ancak buna rağmen kaçmamayı seçti. Onun yerine arkada kalıp bize tuzak kurdu. Bu deliliğin başarılı olacağına ve bir şekilde hayatta kalacağına mı inandı gerçekten?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. Adalbert had been warned, yet he chose not to flee. Instead, he stayed behind to set a trap for us. Did he really believe this madness would succeed and he would somehow survive?"
